title: New: Black City Lights – Give It Up
content:
Opening with an Omar Little-esque whistle is a fairly bold way to return after a year since your last release, and that’s precisely what New Zealand duo Black City Lights do.

One part The XX, one part Siouxsie and the Banshees, it’s foreboding, ambitious and above all, a glorious comeback, expect to hear a lot more from this duo over the coming months. Give It Up is taken from their debut LP, Another Life, out 6th August.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
